title: MA’AT analysis of the O-glycosidic linkages of oligosaccharides using nonconventional NMR J-couplings: MA’AT and MD models of phi
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30286-30294
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06062H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Reagan J. Meredith, Wenhui Zhang, Mi-Kyung Yoon, Xiaosong Hu, Ian Carmichael, Anthony S. Serianni
The use of two-bond 13C–1H spin-coupling constants as nonconventional constraints in MA'AT analyses of the phi torsion angles of O-glycosidic linkages improves the agreement between MA'AT- and MD-determined probability distributions of the angles.
